objects.text:
• Digital LED Display with Smart Controls
• Multiple Wash Cycles & Program Options
• Energy-Efficient Large Capacity Design

* Limited stock available. While supplies last.
See store for details. Offer ends soon.

product_details.name: Insignia Smart Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Excellence
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with Intuitive Controls & Program Selection
• Multiple Wash Cycles Including Express, Delay, and Temperature Settings
• Large Capacity Front-Loading Design with Clear View Door
• Energy-Efficient Operation with Smart Water Management
• Sleek White Finish with Modern Black Accent Door
• Easy-to-Use Control Dial with Multiple Program Options
• Digital Timer Display for Precise Cycle Tracking
• Compact Yet Spacious Design Perfect for Modern Homes
• Anti-Vibration System with Stabilizing Feet
• User-Friendly Interface with Clear Program Indicators
• Customizable Wash Settings for Different Fabric Types
• Premium Build Quality with Durable Components

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a split background with a cool gradient of deep navy to bright blue on the left and a soft white-to-light-blue gradient on the right, enhancing contrast and product visibility. The banner showcases a washing machine image on the right side while content on the left highlights product benefits and pricing. The tagline text ("tagline") at the top uses bold, white fonts to grab attention. The product heading ("heading") is presented prominently beneath it. The bold price display ("price") in vibrant orange contrasts with the crossed-out original price ("price_original"). Below that is a subheading ("subheading") and feature list ("description"). A bright CTA button ("cta") with orange background ("cta_background") and a yellow urgency text ("urgency_text") encourage immediate action. A discreet disclaimer ("disclaimer") sits at the bottom.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: #003366
- Bright Blue: #0066CC
- Soft White: #FFFFFF
- Light Blue Tint: #F0F8FF
- Vibrant Orange: #FF5500
- Electric Yellow: #FFCC00
product_color: The product image showcases a modern washing machine with a sleek, minimalist aesthetic dominated by a monochrome color palette. The primary color is crisp white (#FFFFFF), which conveys cleanliness and simplicity. This is contrasted by a deep charcoal black (#1A1A1A) on the door rim and control panel, adding sophistication and depth. The metallic silver (#C0C0C0) on the knob provides a touch of modernity and industrial appeal. A vivid electric blue (#1E90FF) highlights key LED indicators and dial accents, drawing attention to user interfaces. Together, these hues blend seamlessly, maintaining visual harmony while strategically highlighting functionality and enhancing the product's high-tech appeal.
